import { useState } from 'react'; import './static/Post.css' const Post = () =>{ const [Category,SetCategory] = useState("") const [Change,SetChange] = useState(true); const handleCategory = () =>{ SetChange(false) } const handleCategoryinput = (e)=>{ SetCategory(e) SetChange(false) } return( <>
{Change?(<> ):(<>)}
) } export default Post;
